attributes.action: To order the scrapping of junior school syllabus
attributes.additional_details:
This petition asks the government to take drastic steps to save young British men and woman.
My proposals are quite simple and, I believe, will be immediately effective.
To order the scrapping of junior school syllabus, teach only
Reading, Writing & Arithmetic with an active sport every day.
Vast numbers of children leave school with a total lack of basic skills; unable to read, spell, write legibly.  Numeracy to any useful level is a rarity. Introduce other subjects during secondary school.
Not implementing the above means another school generation leaving with no hope of a worthwhile job.
With immediate effect, open all military bases and prepare to take young people for 2 years.  I would call it National Service  but call it what you like.  We have to get people off the streets, off drugs, off benefits and give them a sense of purpose.  Teach the 3 R`s, discover their vocation & help them achieve that skill during their service to the country.
